original_text: Before this, Eliashib the priest had been put in charge of the storerooms of the house of our God. He was closely associated with Tobiah,
korean_text: 이전에 우리 하나님의 전의 방을 맡은 제사장 엘리아십이 도비야와 연락이 있었으므로

sentences.original_text: had been put in charge of the storerooms
of the house of our God
He was closely associated with Tobiah
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 도비야와 밀접한 관계를 맺고 있었습니다
